game.name: PAYDAY 2: Gage Assault Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: When plan A is not an option.The Gage Assault Pack DLC is the tenth DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds an arsenal of assault weapons to the PAYDAY gang to control the chaos of the battlefield. Three new assault rifles, four new melee weapons, the return of the GL40 grenade launcher, a host of mods, four
